original_title: Tiempo Compartido con La Vida Bohème
overview: Stop wasting energy following the plot. Who cares if your socks don't match? This is the mental vacation you needed. So sit down, relax and enjoy the best that a mercantile society can offer us: Fake remedies, seizure-inducing lights and the tenderness of opening your heart to a bandit.  Classic songs with new faces and new songs that promise to be pool aerobics classics.
title: Tiempo Compartido con La Vida Bohème
